name: World Snowboard Federation
goal:
WSF is the world's umbrella organization for snowboard with a membership comprising 49 national snowboard associations across the globe.

28 national snowboard associations are based in Europe, including 20 Member States of the European Union. Our mission is to develop and promote snowboarding at all levels, in particular youth, grassroots and amateur and to strengthen and protect the rights and health of the athletes.

At EU level, we aim at strengthening the notion of specificity of sport and building on the structures of the European sports model, underpinned by the sports federations. We communicate our policy to the EU institutions and contribute to the growing European debate on sports policy.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Competition, Culture, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, External Relations, Humanitarian Aid, Internal Market, Public Health, Regional Policy, Sport, Youth
euInitiatives:
- Education & Culture;
- internal market;
- environment;
- sport and social policy;
- Free movement of workers;
- Free movement of citizens;
- Competition policy.
